comments: Best class I've taken at Harvard
Unfortunately this course won't be offered next year, or if it is, it'll be a different professor so it's hard to say. I doubt anyone can repeat Professor Enderlein's bravura performance.

Prof. Enderlein is the best! This has been one of the most enjoyable courses I have taken at Harvard. The course's approach to the Euro-crisis, although econ heavy, provides insightful and thought provoking perspectives to public policy in general.
Amazing course - Most rewarding and enjoyable class I have taken this year. Professor Enderlein was great!!
